Sentencas: This work studies the effect of the electronic conductivity of a commercially used yttria-stabilised zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte on solid oxide fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of internal leakage current using a 100 cm2 class planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For the first time, an experimental method is used to measure the electronic conductivity of YSZ in commercially manufactured and operated single cells.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of internal leakage current using a 100 cm2 class planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An inert-gas step addition (ISA) method is employed to measure the electronic conductivity in the form of voltage changes at the open-circuit state.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of internal leakage current using a 100 cm2 class planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Since the electronic conductivity allows oxide ion transfer and water generation at the anode, a reduction in open-circuit voltage (EOCV) occurs due to the increased water partial pressure.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of internal leakage current using a 100 cm2 class planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The step increase in the anode flow rate in the ISA method reduces water partial pressure and raises EOCV.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of internal leakage current using a 100 cm2 class planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The EOCV change is then converted into internal leakage currents and electronic resistivities.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of internal leakage current using a 100 cm2 class planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The YSZ's electronic resistivity obtained in this work is comparable to the results obtained using the Hebb-Wagner polarisation technique and the oxygen permeation method.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of internal leakage current using a 100 cm2 class planar solid oxide fuel cell
